title: 'British elite women's basketball is at a crossroads'
summary: The general manager and head coach of Great Britain's women's basketball team quit their roles with a warning for elite women's basketball in the country.

title: Senegal boss Thiaw banned after Afcon final chaos
summary: Senegal manager Pape Thiaw his banned for five games after the chaotic scenes during the Africa Cup of Nations final against Morocco.

title: We'll do whatever it takes for Ospreys - Williams
summary: Ospreys legend Shane Williams says he and his former team-mates will do everything they can to save their old team.

title: Waymo begins service at San Francisco International Airport
summary: As fans and media prepare to descend on the Bay Area for Super Bowl LX, what does a high-tech city like San Francisco do? Why, call in the robotaxis, of course. title: Ireland defeat UAE in first T20 international
summary: Ireland begin their three-match T20 series against the United Arab Emirates with a 57-run win over the hosts in Dubai.

title: First Newey-designed Aston Martin emerges at testing
summary: The first Aston Martin to be designed under the leadership of eminent designer Adrian Newey catches attention as it appears in pre-season testing.

title: England 'off the pace' in defeat by South Africa
summary: England captain Fran Williams says the Roses were "off the pace" against South Africa as they are beaten 52-48 in the opening game of the three-match series in Johannesburg.

title: Palace move for Â£50m Strand Larsen in doubt
summary: Crystal Palace's Â£50m move for Wolves striker Jorgen Strand Larsen is in the balance after the Eagles suggest they could walk away from the deal.

summary: Premier League clubs always had the money, but now they also have the know-how they have dominated this season's Champions League.

title: Spotify has a group messaging feature now
summary: Spotify is adding group chats to the messaging service it premiered last year. In an addendum to the original blog post introducing Messages, the company announced that users can initiate chats with up to 10 of their friends to share the podcasts, playlists and songs they are listening to.
